artist: Painter: After Anthony van Dyck; Engraver: William Raddon; Publisher: John Major
description: half length portrait of subject turned rightt and looking back at viewer; curly hair, beard and moustache; black cloak
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

on sheet, below image in black: Van Dyck pinx.   W. Raddon sculp. / LUKE VOSTERMAN. / LONDON / Published by John Major, 50 Fleet Street/ Febr\'y 15th 1828 | on sheet in pencil: 2-576
title: Luke Vosterman
